title: Getting Started: Virtual Lab
summary_markdown:
Welcome to the Hedgehog Virtual Lab! This course will guide you through accessing your cloud-based learning environment across all three major cloud providers.

You'll learn how to connect to and use the Hedgehog Virtual Lab (VLAB) using Google Cloud, Amazon Web Services, and Microsoft Azure. By the end of this course, you'll be comfortable accessing your hands-on learning environment from any of these platforms.

content_blocks.title: Welcome to Your Virtual Lab
content_blocks.body_markdown: The Hedgehog Virtual Lab (VLAB) is your dedicated cloud environment for hands-on learning. This course covers three different ways to access your VLAB, depending on which cloud provider you're using or prefer.

content_blocks.title: Choose Your Cloud Provider
content_blocks.body_markdown:
You only need to complete **one** of the three modules below based on your preferred or assigned cloud provider:

- **Google Cloud** - If you're using Google Cloud Platform
- **AWS** - If you're using Amazon Web Services
- **Azure** - If you're using Microsoft Azure

If you're not sure which to choose, contact your instructor or administrator.

content_blocks.title: Next Steps
content_blocks.body_markdown: Once you've successfully accessed your VLAB, you're ready to continue with additional learning pathways and modules. Check the pathways page to explore what's available!
